data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Balaghat, Madhya Pradesh, India honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Balaghat, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Balaghat, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Balaghat, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 18,719 believers in Balaghat, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Kunbi Jadav people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, help the church in the county of Balaghat to exponentially multiply disciples.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Balaghat access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 18,719 believers in the county of Balaghat the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

location.name: Balaghat
location.people_groups_list: Mahar (Hindu traditions), Kunbi Tirole, Garpaguri, Halba, Gond Mannewar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Mahar (Hindu traditions) (9,491,000), Kunbi Tirole (333,000), Garpaguri (33,000), Halba (728,000), Gond Mannewar (47,000)
